title: CS Competency Practical Enhancement: Cybercrime Prevention Education Applying Fear Appeal Instructional Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can improve their awareness of the severity of cybercrime and personal vulnerability levels by over 80%.
Learners can explain at least three educational design principles utilizing fear appeal approaches.
Learners can collaboratively develop cybercrime prevention education modules based on the ADDIE model in team settings.
Learners can achieve at least 70 points in applying prevention strategies in summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
